exceptions.exn: In environment S1, S2, T1, T2 : cpo f1 : S1 -> T1 f2 : S2 -> T2 H : exists M : monotone f1, forall s : chain S1, f1 (lim s) = lim [f1^^sbyM] H0 : exists M : monotone f2, forall s : chain S2, f2 (lim s) = lim [f2^^sbyM] Unable to unify "forall x y : pairPoset ?S1 ?S2, x <== y -> (?f1 \\* ?f2) x <== (?f1 \\* ?f2) y" with "exists M : monotone (f1 \\* f2), forall s : chain (pairCPO S1 S2), (f1 \\* f2) (lim s) = lim [f1 \\* f2^^sbyM]".
The reference M1 was not found in the current environment.
The reference H1 was not found in the current environment.
The reference M2 was not found in the current environment.

In environment S1, S2, T1, T2 : cpo f1 : S1 -> T1 f2 : S2 -> T2 M : monotone f2 H0 : forall s : chain S2, f2 (lim s) = lim [f2^^sbyM] H2 : monotone (f2 \\* f2) M0 : monotone f1 H : forall s : chain S1, f1 (lim s) = lim [f1^^sbyM0] Unable to unify "monotone (f2 \\* f2)" with "toPred (and (bot \\In ex (A:=monotone (f1 \\* f2)))) (forall d : chain (funCPO (monotone (f1 \\* f2)) propCPO), d <=p ex (A:=monotone (f1 \\* f2)) -> lim d \\In ex (A:=monotone (f1 \\* f2)))".

original: intros. intros cont_f1 cont_f2. unfold continuous in *. intros M1 M2. unfold comp. intros [x1 x2] [y1 y2] [H1 H2]. apply prod_mono. apply M1. apply H1. apply M2. apply H2.
